channel.title: "Noble's Call" and "Nobles" ability names changed to prevent confusion
channel.description: We have **[The Noble](http://tol.wikia.com/wiki/The_Noble)** class, but then we also have **Nobles.** All nobles can step up to become the king by using their **Noble's Call** ability. > [color=blue]Wait wat?? This is confusing![/color] **Ok -- Let's change it.** _____________________________________________ [color=red]**This will now be changed to prevent confusion:**[/color] * **The Noble** class will remain the same. * **Nobles** will now be known as **Royals**. * The **Noble's Call** ability will now be known as **Royal Blood**. We decided to change this after some feedback from awesome people just like you ;)

item.title: "Noble's Call" and "Nobles" ability names changed to prevent confusion
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We have The Noble class, but then we also have Nobles.

All nobles can step up to become the king by using their Noble’s Call ability.

Wait wat?? This is confusing! Ok – Let’s change it.

This will now be changed to prevent confusion:

  • The Noble class will remain the same.
  • Nobles will now be known as Royals.
  • The Noble’s Call ability will now be known as Royal Blood.

We decided to change this after some feedback from awesome people just like you

Read full topic
item.source: "Noble's Call" and "Nobles" ability names changed to prevent confusion
